item.title: Part I
item.description: Game Series Part I InfoPremiere, Interactive, Tower-Defense Game Workshop for Programmers of All Levels… This event has ended on November 11th, 2021. You can find a recording of the event here!

item.title: Part II
item.description: Game Series Part II InfoPremiere, Interactive, Tower-Defense Game Workshop for Programmers of All Levels… This event has ended on December 2nd, 2021. You can find a recording of the event here!

item.title: Part III
item.description: Game Series Part III InfoPremiere, Interactive, Tower-Defense Game Workshop for Programmers of All Levels… This event has ended on December 16th, 2021. You can find a recording of the event here!

item.title: Leaderboard
item.description: InfoParticipate to earn GAME DEV POINTS, which will award you with a surprise during the Game Jam! Each participation will be worth 200 points, with winners of the special challenges earning bonus points. Rank Name Part I Part II Part III Total Points
